attributes.action: New Years Honours for 50 years of Excellence
attributes.additional_details:
Recognise Bruce Dickinson,Adrian Smith, Dave Murray,Janick Gers & past members Nicko Mcbrain, Clive Burr & Paul Dianno. And obviously the mighty Steve Harris who's been there since day 1. 
50 yrs showing  Earth that we can be great, patriotic and brilliant.
National honours sometimes seem to have lost their charm , in this case we must honour these legends whilst they are still rocking.
They started when David Beckham was 7 mths old & he's just been honoured. Maiden are still going not retired
attributes.background:
In December 1975, a young man decided to set up a rock band and introduce his musical vision to the world. Steve Harris has since kept the same vision and band together. 
Iron Maiden have proved that this country can produce something that the world can cherish.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for someone to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
